players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Diana's death is suspicious. We need to investigate who might be responsible."
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Charlie: "Alice, if Bob is telling the truth about investigating you, then you must be the mafia. But if Bob is lying, then he is the mafia. We need more info before voting."
Charlie: "Alice's silence is suspicious. If Bob is lying, he should explain why. We should focus on who benefits from Diana's death before rushing to vote."
Bob: "Alice is the mafia. Charlie, your hesitation only helps her. We cannot afford to delay; voting Alice out now is our best chance to save the town."

players.name: Bob

Charlie: "Alice's silence is suspicious. If Bob is lying, he should explain why. We should focus on who benefits from Diana's death before rushing to vote."
You: "Alice is the mafia. Charlie, your hesitation only helps her. We cannot afford to delay; voting Alice out now is our best chance to save the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
